text: “Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ nɨghnɨzir kam ia danɨngasa. Nan gol avim bar an isigha an itir bizir kuraba bar da adangi. Kamaghɨn ia golɨn kam na dama a givezegh, dagɨaba avɨrasemegham. Egh uaghan ia uan mɨkarzim avɨsɨ korotiar ghurghuritam givesegh, eghtɨ gumazamiziba ian gantɨ ia bibiabara ikɨva, aghumsɨghan kogham. Egh uaghan ia uan damazibar aghusɨ marasin givesegh, egh ia ganam.
